title: Input schema of the Alternative credit data scraper

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Seed URLs to start crawling from (provider homepages, product listing pages, comparison sites).

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler.

followInternalOnly.title: Follow internal links only
followInternalOnly.description: If true, only follow links within the same host as each start URL.

redactPII.title: Redact PII
redactPII.description: If true, the Actor will attempt to redact or skip personally-identifiable information (recommended).
